meanings.sent1: The nonappearance of the witness delayed the trial.
meanings.sent2: Her nonappearance at the meeting was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The nonappearance of the magician made the audience wonder if he had disappeared for real.
meanings.sent4: The nonappearance of the sun behind the clouds was like a cloak of darkness descending upon the land.
meanings.sent5: The nonappearance of the bus left the commuters stranded at the stop.

meanings.sent1: The nonappearance of stars in the city sky was due to light pollution.
meanings.sent2: His nonappearance in class raised concerns about his well-being.
meanings.sent3: The nonappearance of the cat during the day was a mystery to the family.
meanings.sent4: The nonappearance of sound in the empty room created an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The nonappearance of footprints in the snow indicated that nobody had passed by recently.
